```{r, results='markup'}
#First, load the file
df_orig = data.frame(read.csv("online_shoppers_intention.csv"))
head(df_orig)
```


```{r, results='markup'}
colSums(is.na(df_orig))
```

```{r, results='markup'}
table(df_orig$OperatingSystems)
```

```{r, results='markup'}
df = data.frame(df_orig)

df[, c('VisitorType', 'Weekend', 'Revenue')] <- sapply(df[, c('VisitorType', 'Weekend', 'Revenue')], unclass)

df$VisitorType = factor(df$VisitorType)
df$Weekend = factor(df$Weekend)
df$Revenue = factor(df$Revenue)

head(df)
```

```{r, results='markup'}
ggplot(df, aes(x=OperatingSystems)) + geom_histogram(bins = 8, fill="pink") + geom_freqpoly(bins=8, color="red")
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x=TrafficType, color=Revenue)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 1, alpha=0.6, position = 'identity') +
```
